<!-- goal philosophy -->
<div class="content">
<h4 style="color:#051729;line-height:50px;font-weight:600;">
SUPPORTING HEALTHY MARINE ECOSYSTEMS
</h4>

<h5 style="font-size:23px">
This goal captures the conservation status of marine species.
</h5>

<h5>
The Baltic Sea is home to about 2,700 macroscopic species and innumerable smaller microscopic species.
</h5>

<!-- goal infographics -->

```{r include = FALSE, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width = 11) 

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)

scores <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OHI-Baltic/bhi/master/index/scorelist.csv") %>% 
  filter(region_id == "BHI-000", year == 2020) %>% 
  select(dimension, goal, score)
```


<div class="rgncontainer">
<div class="rgnmap" style="background-color:#f2f4f5f7;width:49.5%;height:100%;padding:10px;">
```{r, echo = FALSE}
ggplot(filter(scores, goal == "BD", dimension == "score")) +
  geom_rect(aes(xmin = 0, xmax = 100, ymin = 0, ymax = 100), fill = "#dbe4eb") +
  geom_rect(aes(xmin = 0, xmax = score, ymin = 0, ymax = score), fill = "#629ec1", color = NA) +
  geom_text(aes(x = score/2, y = score/2, label = round(score)), size = 65, color = "#f9fafb", family = "Impact") +
  theme_void() 
```
<br>
<br>
<p style="text-align:center">
The overall Baltic score average for the Biodiversity goal 
<br>
is 70 out of 100.
</p>

</div>

<div class="rgnmap" style="background-color:#f2f4f5f7;width:49.5%;height:100%;padding:10px;">
```{r, echo = FALSE}
scores %>% 
  filter(goal == "BD", dimension %in% c("future", "score")) %>% 
  tidyr::pivot_wider(names_from = "dimension",  values_from = "score") %>% 
  mutate(score_diff = (future-score)/score*100) %>% 
  mutate(score_diff = paste(ifelse(score_diff > 0, "+", ""), round(score_diff),  "%")) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_rect(aes(xmin = 0, xmax = 100, ymin = 0, ymax = 100), fill = "#bcd1dfb3", color = NA) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(0, 100)) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 100)) +
  geom_text(aes(x = 50, y = 50, label = score_diff), size = 65, color = "#629ec1", family = "Impact") +
  theme_void()
```
<br>
<br>
<p style="text-align:center">
It is estimated that in the near future the score for the Biodiversity goal will improve roughly +6%. 
</p>

</div>

<!-- some text about the goal -->

<div class="content">
<h4 style="color:#051729;line-height:50px;font-weight:600;">
WHAT DOES THIS SCORE MEAN?
</h4>

This goal consists of five components: benthic habitats, pelagic habitats, fish, mammals (seals), and seabirds.

A high score indicates that the conservation status of marine species and the condition of key habitats that support high numbers of species is high and healthy.

Including a greater range of more specific habitat types and functional types (in a transparent way), could help make the goal more actionable for managers at local scales.

<br>
</div>
